name: Mercat Central
description: Modernista market building with colorful tiles & a diverse collection of stalls, separated by type.

name: El Carme
description: A charming neighborhood filled with narrow streets, bohemian vibes, and historic buildings.

name: Ciudad de las Artes y Ciencas
description: Valencia's iconic cultural and architectural complex located at one end of the Turia. It features a collection of futuristic buildings, including an opera house, an IMAX cinema, a science museum, and an open air nightclub.

name: Turia
description: Public park located in the heart of the city. The park was built in the 1980s on the former riverbed of the Turia River, which was diverted after a devastating flood. The park stretches over 9 kilometers and features walking and cycling paths, sports facilities, playgrounds, gardens, and cultural attractions, making it a popular destination for locals and visitors alike.

name: Bike Guy VLC
description: Your best option for a guided bike tour around the city. Luke will tell you the most intesting stories and will definitely "make you fall in love with the city".

name: Oceanogràfic
description: Europe's largest aquarium, located within the City of Arts and Sciences, where you can embark on a captivating underwater journey, encountering a diverse range of marine life.

name: BioParc
description: A remarkable safari style zoo that aims to recreate the natural habitats of its animals.

name: Hundred Burgers
description: One of the best Burger places in Valencia. Multiple restaurants around the city. More towards the pricy side of Burgers. Each burer has a Beyond-meat option as well. Bear in mind: the greasy burgers are really greasy.

name: La Pepica
description: World famous restaurant located at the beach. It is a historic establishment, founded in 1898, with a rich culinary tradition, specializing in traditional Valencian cuisine, particularly its most famous dish, paella.

name: Amor Amargo
description: Good restaurant with traditional Spanish dishes. Great interior design. The boquerones are a must.

name: Boatella Tapas
description: Busy, casual tapas bar with outdoor seating serving all the iconic Spanish tapas. Be sure to always state the size of the tapa you're ordering.

name: Tasca Angel
description: Tapas, wines & beers are served in this intimate setting where you sit right at the bar. This old establishment, founded in 1946, is especially known for its sardines.

name: Mare Meua Bar de Tapas
description: Small cozy restaurant with a not so traditional tapas selection. The food is great and the service is even better.

name: Casa Carmela
description: Beautiful, cozy paella restaurant. More on the chique side. Their kitchen let's you take a look on how they cook their paella traditionally on woodfire. Make sure to reserve a table.

name: Bocadella Tapas
description: Not too traditional restaurant with delicious italian inspired tapas. Decently priced.

name: Tagomago
description: Stylish restaurant located at a beautiful square. Definitely recommended to eat outside if the temperature allows. The restaurant serves a fusion cuisine with dishes inspired by the Asian and Spanish cuisine. On week days you'll get a three course meal for about €15.

name: Copenhagen
description: Nice restaurant with a calm atmosphere. Specialized in vegetarian and vegan dishes.

name: Voltereta, Bienvenido a MAnhattan
description: Unique dining experience that takes you back to the roaring 20s of Manhattan. The entrance to the restaurant is a journey of itself. They have 2 differently themed restaurants as well.

name: Kawori
description: "Unusual Japanese Food" is their slogan. Every dish is indeed unusual, but delicious. It is highly recommended to ask the staff to compose the courses for you, as it is very common in this restaurant. You will spend between €50 and €60 per person, but it is worth every cent.

name: La Chingada
description: Mexican restaurant that serves good comfort food.

name: Gave MX
description: The most authentic Mexican food can be found here.

name: Rey Taco
description: ood, cheap taco's downtown Valencia. Ideal if you crave delicious food, but don't want a full-sized meal.

name: Osaka II
description: Sushi restaurant where they serve a buffet, a la carte, or right from the revolving sushi bar.

name: Swagat II
description: Highly rated Indian restaurant with a very friendly staff.

name: Kreas
description: Decently priced Greek food.

name: Mercabanyal
description: Cool foodcourt-like venue near the beach with around 8 different foodstalls. Very nice to go after the beach.

name: Boa Beach
description: Tropical themed bar at the seaside with great cocktails.

name: Marina Beach Club
description: Very popular beach club as the name implies. Turns into an open air club at night with a stage that reminds of your typical EDM festival.

name: Barcelo
description: Cocktailbar that you should go to for the views. Their big rooftop terrace has perfect views over the city of arts and sciences. Recommended to go when it's dark. The entrance is through the hotel's lobby.

name: La fabrica de Hielo
description: Modern culture venue with industrial-chic decor, hosting live music & other events. Just as good to go during the day as at night.

name: Cafe de las Horas
description: Perfect place to try "Agua de Valencia". Unique interior design - usually very busy in the evenings.

name: Radiocity
description: Well-known down to earth venue for live music and a night out. There's live reggae music on Wednesdays and Saturdays until 12. After 12 the DJ plays a mix of prettu much everything. Type of place where it doesn't matter what you look like or what you wear.

name: Mya
description: One of the biggest nightclubs on a very prominent location. This venue has the complete clubbing experience. Tends to attract a lot of students on other days than Friday and Saturday. Will play house and urban music. There is an entrance cover of €25, but if you buy your ticket in advance online it will €20. On some days you can get free tickets through the Valencia Language Exchange.

name: Oven Club
description: Nightclub that focusses on deep house music. Upstairs is a small area, but you'll find the dark, laser filled larger area downstairs.
